Package de.esoco.lib.event

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EditListener<T>
    An listener interface for objects that need to be notified of editing events.
    Event<T>
    A generic event interface.
    EventHandler<E extends Event<?>>
    An extended event listener interface that requires from implementations to provide a single EventHandler.handleEvent(Event) method.
    EventListener
    General interface for event listeners that do not contain specific event handling methods.
    EventSource<E extends Event<?>>
    An interface for classes that can generate events of the generic type E.
    SelectionListener<T>
    An event listener interface that will be notified of the de-/selection of objects of a certain type.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ElementEvent<S,E,U>
    An event object that contains information related to the modification of an element of a source object.
    EventDispatcher<E extends Event<?>>
    An event handler implementation that dispatches events to a set of event handlers.
    EventMulticaster<E extends Event<?>>
    An event handler implementation that chains multiple event handlers and propagates incoming events to all registered handlers.
    GenericEvent<T>
    A generic event class that implements the Event interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EditListener.EditAction
    Enumeration of the standard actions for the editing of objects.
    ElementEvent.EventType
    Enumeration of the possible relation event types
